title: Design Process for Mathematics Teacher Education Utilizing Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing Competencies in Generative AI-Based Math Instructional Design Within Smartphone-Centric, Technology-Constrained Environments

learning_goals: They can describe a mathematics lesson design framework that reflects the technical and ethical characteristics of generative AI.
They can develop an interactive prompt set that facilitates the mathematics problem-solving process using AI tools.
They can create an AI-integrated mathematics teaching plan based on the TPACK model and improve it through peer feedback.
They can identify ethical issues that may arise when using generative AI in education and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
